column1: # NOTE: the upgrade utility currently sadly cannot upgrade from all versions and it will upgrade
# plugins not mentioned in here depending on the version of GATE it runs under!
# So in order to do a controlled upgrade, we need to mention ALL plugin version that get used anywhere in here!!
# To find existing plugin versions in all xgapp files:
# xmlstarlet sel -t -m '//urlList/localList/gate.creole.Plugin-Maven' -v 'concat("creole://", group, ";", artifact, ";", version, "/")' --nl `find . -name \*.xgapp` | sort -u
